special_text:
Diverge [i](Pick only one path as a sorcery to gain that type and a +1/+1 counter.)[/i]
[i]“It’s just good business.”[/i]
{3}{U}{U}: Merchant
Shuffle your hand into your library, then draw five cards. You may put any number of land cards from your hand onto the battlefield.
{X}{R}: Rebel
Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. It gains haste. Activate only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
